name.ja: <ruby>歴<rt>れき</rt></ruby><ruby>戦<rt>せん</rt></ruby>のカース・オブ・ドラゴン

summoning_condition.en: If you have no monsters on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card's name becomes "Curse of Dragon" this turn. Then, you can Fusion Summon by shuffling this card from your field and 1 monster from your field or Graveyard into the owner's Deck as material.
